ygData.msgSnippet: On the monitor, Black Aracnia saw Megatron, and heard he wanted to talk. She hit the communications button. So, grapeface, lets talk. I have your two minions

    On the monitor, Black Aracnia saw Megatron, and heard he wanted to talk. 
She hit the communications button.
    "So, grapeface, lets talk. I have your two minions captive in here and an 
itchy trigger finger. I suggest you say something I like or you can kiss them 
goodbye."
